title: Boston African American National Historic Site: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       Boston African American National Historic Site is located in a busy downtown neighborhood of Boston, MA.  For your safety, we limit our walking tours to 15 people per Ranger.  The sidewalks are narrow and often uneven, and there can be traffic hazards.  Please be sure to wear comfortable walking shoes, dress appropriately for the weather, and bring water.   Tours will be cancelled in the event of lightning and extreme weather and temperatures.  Please contact (617) 742-5415 or visit the park website for any park alerts regarding tour cancellation.
